T02D3078:173b-0: @173b # // de nas mchod rten gyi don bshad de /
T02D3078:173b-1: bsags par bya ba yin pas bsags pa'o //
T02D3078:173b-2: yang na bsags su rung ba'i phyir yang bsags pa zhes bya'o //
T02D3078:173b-3: yang na don gyi skabs su 'dir dran par bya ba yin pas na dran pa zhes bya ste /
T02D3078:173b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'i bdag nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D3078:173b-5: yang dag par sbong ba dang /
T02D3078:173b-8: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D3078:173b-12: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D3078:173b-13: snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i yon tan de
T02D3078:173b-14: dag yun ring po nas thabs kyi bye brag gis
T02D3078:173b-15: bsags pa dang / sngon yang dag par ma bsgoms kyang /
T02D3078:173b-16: don gyi skabs dag tu 'dul ba rnams kyis dran
T02D3078:173b-17: par bya ba'i phyir na btsigs pa zhes bya ba'am
T02D3078:173b-19: de dag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod rten zhes bya'o //
T02D3078:173b-20: chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya'o //
T02D3078:173b-26: 'khor lo brtsegs ma bcu gsum dang /
T02D3078:173b-27: char khebs rnams ni mchod rten gyi dbyibs yin no //
T02D3078:173b-28: de la bang rim dang po na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ste /
T02D3078:173b-29: 'di ltar lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T02D3078:173b-32: chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o //
T02D3078:174a-0: @174a * // bang rim gnyis pa ni yang dag par sbong ba bzhi ste /
T02D3078:174a-1: 'di ltar sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir brtson pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-2: sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-3: dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir brtson pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-4: dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa'o //
T02D3078:174a-5: bang rim gsum pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste /
T02D3078:174a-6: 'di ltar 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du
T02D3078:174a-7: byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang
T02D3078:174a-9: dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin slong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o //
T02D3078:174a-10: bang rim bzhi pa dbang po lnga ste /
T02D3078:174a-11: 'di ltar dad pa'i dbang po dang /
T02D3078:174a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
T02D3078:174a-16: bum rten ni stobs lnga ste /
T02D3078:174a-22: bum pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun te /
T02D3078:174a-23: 'di ltar dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
T02D3078:174a-28: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D3078:174a-29: pu shu ni lam yan lag brgyad pa ste /
T02D3078:174a-30: 'di ltar yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /
T02D3078:174a-31: yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-35: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang ;
T02D3078:174a-36: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-37: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D3078:174a-38: srog shing ni shes pa bcu ste /
T02D3078:174a-39: 'di ltar kun rdzob shes pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-40: pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-42: rjes su rtogs par shes pa dang /
T02D3078:174a-49: 'khor lo dang po ni gnas dang /
T02D3078:174a-50: gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174a-51: 'khor lo gnyis pa ni las bdag gir mkhyen pa'i stobs gsum pa ni bsam gtan dang /
T02D3078:174b-2: snyoms par 'jug pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-3: 'khor lo bzhi pa ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-4: 'khor lo lnga pa ni mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-5: 'khor lo drug pa ni khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-6: 'khor lo bdun pa ni thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-7: 'khor lo brgyad pa ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-8: 'khor lo dgu pa ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-9: 'khor lo bcu pa ni zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so //
T02D3078:174b-10: 'khor lo bcu gcig pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po ste /
T02D3078:174b-11: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na /
T02D3078:174b-12: slob ma thams cad mthun par gus par nyan pa la dga' ba'i sems mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D3078:174b-14: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa ste /
T02D3078:174b-15: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams la chos ston pa na /
T02D3078:174b-16: slob ma thams cad mthun par gus par mi nyan pa la khong khro ba mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D3078:174b-17: 'khor lo bcu gsum pa ni ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa ste /
T02D3078:174b-18: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor rnams la chos
T02D3078:174b-19: ston pa la slob ma la gus par mnyan la
T02D3078:174b-20: / la la gus par mi nyan pa rnams la dga' ba dang /
T02D3078:174b-21: khong khro ba gnyis mi 'byung ba'o //
T02D3078:174b-22: char khebs ni snying rje chen po ste /
T02D3078:174b-23: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyud smin pa dang /
T02D3078:174b-25: da ltar smin pa rnams kyi don dpyod cing /
T02D3078:174b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku ma lus pa
T02D3078:174b-28: dus kyi khyad par dag tu yang dag 'dzin 'di
T02D3078:174b-29: ni mchod rten gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D3078:174b-30: de las gzhan pa'i rdo rings dang /
T02D3078:174b-32: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D3078:174b-33: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
T02D3078:174b-39: ba dan la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
T02D3078:174b-40: kyi sku'i rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad
T02D3078:175a-1: de la rdo rings rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-2: 'di ltar zag pa zad pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3078:175a-4: bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams phyin ci log par bstan pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-5: nges par 'byung ba'i lam phyin ci ma log par bstan pa'o ;
T02D3078:175a-6: / them skas kyis ni bsrung ba med pa bzhi bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-7: 'di ltar sku'i phrin las yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-8: gsung gi phrin las yongs su dag pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-9: thugs kyi phrin las yongs su dag ba dang /
T02D3078:175a-11: chu srin rgyal mtshan rnams kyis ni /
T02D3078:175a-12: bdud kyi rgyal mtshan bsnyal bar bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-13: 'di ltar lha'i bdud bsnyal ba dang /
T02D3078:175a-14: nyon mongs pa'i bdud bsnyal ba dang /
T02D3078:175a-17: me tog gi phreng bas ni bla na med pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po bstan to //
T02D3078:175a-18: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bshad pas /
T02D3078:175a-19: 'jig rten bzhi la phan 'dogs par bstan to //
T02D3078:175a-20: 'di ltar so so'i skye bo la phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-21: rgyun du zhugs pa la phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-22: lan cig phyir 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-23: phyir mi 'ong ba la phan 'dogs pa'o //
T02D3078:175a-24: dril bu rnams ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-25: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pas tshegs chung dus stong
T02D3078:175a-26: gsum gyi stong chen por tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D3078:175a-27: khams su chos bstan pa'i sgra skad kyis kun du
T02D3078:175a-28: 'gengs pa'o // gdugs kyis ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi spyi bor gyur par bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rkang pa med pa dang /
T02D3078:175a-33: gzugs med pa rnams kyi mchog ces bya bar gyur pa'o //
T02D3078:175a-34: / zla bas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-35: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa'i 'jig rten
T02D3078:175a-36: du bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi mig skyed
T02D3078:175a-37: par mdzad pa'o // dar gyi cod pan gyis ni
T02D3078:175a-38: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D3078:175a-39: chub kyi cod pan thogs pa bstan te /
T02D3078:175a-40: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kun du 'jug pa'o //
T02D3078:175b-0: ba dan rnams kyis ni bla na med @175b pa'i chos kyi grags pa'i ba dan bstan te /
T02D3078:175b-1: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo
T02D3078:175b-2: bskor ba'i grags pas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor non
